mule.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/validation http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/validation/current/mule-validation.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/current/mule-db.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http/current/mule-http.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch/current/mule-batch.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core/current/mule-ee.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core/current/mule.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/os http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/os/current/mule-os.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/salesforce http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/salesforce/current/mule-salesforce.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/vm http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/vm/current/mule-vm.xsd

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output text/plain var latestOff = vars.offset as Number var fch = vars.fetch as Number var date1 = vars.beginDate var date2 = vars.endDate --- if(date1 != null and date2 != null) ("SELECT item.IMA_ItemID, item.IMA_SupercededItemID, item.IMA_ItemName, item.IMA_Classification, item.IMA_UnitMeasure, item.IMA_Price, item.IMA_PriceMatrixFlag, item.IMA_PriceCodeID, item.IMA_SalesTaxFlag, item.IMA_ItemTypeCode, item.IMA_CustItemID, item.IMA_RevLevel, item.IMA_OnHandQty, item.IMA_ProdFam, item.IMA_ProdModel, item.IMA_LeadTimeCode, item.IMA_PurLeadTime, item.IMA_MfgLeadTime, item.IMA_ItemStatusCode, item.IMA_SalesConvFactor, item.IMA_RoutHrsExcptFlag, item.IMA_GLSalesAcctNbr, item.IMA_CustomerID, item.IMA_OutplantLeadTime, item.IMA_LastModifiedDate, item.IMA_MinSalesQuantity, item.IMA_NonDiscountable, item.IMA_NonCommisionable, item.IMA_Length, item.IMA_LengthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Width, item.IMA_WidthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Height, item.IMA_HeightUnitMeasure, item.IMA_WeightUnitMeasure, ItemAttribute.Attribute1_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute2_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute3_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute4_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute5_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute6_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute7_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute8_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute9_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute10_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute11_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute12_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute13_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute14_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute15_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute16_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute17_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute18_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute19_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute20_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute21_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute22_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute23_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute24_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute25_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute26_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute27_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute28_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute29_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute30_Value, IMS.IMS_LongDesc, Item.IMA_UserDef4 FROM Item INNER JOIN ItemAttribute ON Item.IMA_RecordID = ItemAttribute.ItemAttr_IMA_RecordID INNER JOIN IMS ON Item.IMA_RecordID = IMS.IMS_IMA_RecordId WHERE Item.IMA_ItemStatusCode = 'ACTIVE' AND (Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode LIKE 'FGS%' OR Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode = 'Finished Good') AND IMA_LastModifiedDate > '" ++ date1 ++ "' AND IMA_LastModifiedDate < '" ++ date2 ++ "' ORDER BY IMA_LastModifiedDate OFFSET " ++ latestOff ++ " ROWS FETCH NEXT " ++ fch ++ " ROWS ONLY") else if(date1 != null) ("SELECT item.IMA_ItemID, item.IMA_SupercededItemID, item.IMA_ItemName, item.IMA_Classification, item.IMA_UnitMeasure, item.IMA_Price, item.IMA_PriceMatrixFlag, item.IMA_PriceCodeID, item.IMA_SalesTaxFlag, item.IMA_ItemTypeCode, item.IMA_CustItemID, item.IMA_RevLevel, item.IMA_OnHandQty, item.IMA_ProdFam, item.IMA_ProdModel, item.IMA_LeadTimeCode, item.IMA_PurLeadTime, item.IMA_MfgLeadTime, item.IMA_ItemStatusCode, item.IMA_SalesConvFactor, item.IMA_RoutHrsExcptFlag, item.IMA_GLSalesAcctNbr, item.IMA_CustomerID, item.IMA_OutplantLeadTime, item.IMA_LastModifiedDate, item.IMA_MinSalesQuantity, item.IMA_NonDiscountable, item.IMA_NonCommisionable, item.IMA_Length, item.IMA_LengthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Width, item.IMA_WidthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Height, item.IMA_HeightUnitMeasure, item.IMA_WeightUnitMeasure, ItemAttribute.Attribute1_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute2_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute3_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute4_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute5_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute6_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute7_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute8_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute9_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute10_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute11_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute12_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute13_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute14_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute15_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute16_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute17_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute18_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute19_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute20_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute21_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute22_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute23_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute24_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute25_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute26_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute27_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute28_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute29_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute30_Value, IMS.IMS_LongDesc, Item.IMA_UserDef4 FROM Item INNER JOIN ItemAttribute ON Item.IMA_RecordID = ItemAttribute.ItemAttr_IMA_RecordID INNER JOIN IMS ON Item.IMA_RecordID = IMS.IMS_IMA_RecordId WHERE Item.IMA_ItemStatusCode = 'ACTIVE' AND (Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode LIKE 'FGS%' OR Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode = 'Finished Good') AND IMA_LastModifiedDate > '" ++ date1 ++ "' ORDER BY IMA_LastModifiedDate OFFSET " ++ latestOff ++ " ROWS FETCH NEXT " ++ fch ++" ROWS ONLY") else ("SELECT item.IMA_ItemID, item.IMA_SupercededItemID, item.IMA_ItemName, item.IMA_Classification, item.IMA_UnitMeasure, item.IMA_Price, item.IMA_PriceMatrixFlag, item.IMA_PriceCodeID, item.IMA_SalesTaxFlag, item.IMA_ItemTypeCode, item.IMA_CustItemID, item.IMA_RevLevel, item.IMA_OnHandQty, item.IMA_ProdFam, item.IMA_ProdModel, item.IMA_LeadTimeCode, item.IMA_PurLeadTime, item.IMA_MfgLeadTime, item.IMA_ItemStatusCode, item.IMA_SalesConvFactor, item.IMA_RoutHrsExcptFlag, item.IMA_GLSalesAcctNbr, item.IMA_CustomerID, item.IMA_OutplantLeadTime, item.IMA_LastModifiedDate, item.IMA_MinSalesQuantity, item.IMA_NonDiscountable, item.IMA_NonCommisionable, item.IMA_Length, item.IMA_LengthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Width, item.IMA_WidthUnitMeasure, item.IMA_Height, item.IMA_HeightUnitMeasure, item.IMA_WeightUnitMeasure, ItemAttribute.Attribute1_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute2_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute3_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute4_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute5_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute6_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute7_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute8_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute9_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute10_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute11_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute12_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute13_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute14_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute15_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute16_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute17_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute18_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute19_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute20_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute21_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute22_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute23_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute24_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute25_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute26_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute27_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute28_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute29_Value, ItemAttribute.Attribute30_Value, IMS.IMS_LongDesc, Item.IMA_UserDef4 FROM Item INNER JOIN ItemAttribute ON Item.IMA_RecordID = ItemAttribute.ItemAttr_IMA_RecordID INNER JOIN IMS ON Item.IMA_RecordID = IMS.IMS_IMA_RecordId WHERE Item.IMA_ItemStatusCode = 'ACTIVE' AND (Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode LIKE 'FGS%' OR Item.IMA_ItemTypeCode = 'Finished Good') AND IMA_LastModifiedDate > '" ++ (now() as DateTime {format: 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'}) ++ "' ORDER BY IMA_LastModifiedDate OFFSET " ++ latestOff ++ " ROWS FETCH NEXT " ++ fch ++" ROWS ONLY")

http:request.doc:name: Request: Lumicor sandbox DB
http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { lastModifiedDate: now(), query : vars.query, database: "iERP90_SANDBOX" }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { //Item Info "Name": $.IMA_ItemName, "ItemID__c": $.IMA_ItemID, "SupercededItemID__c": $.IMA_SupercededItemID, "ItemName__c": $.IMA_ItemName, "Description": $.IMS_LongDesc, "Classification__c": $.IMA_Classification, "UnitMeasure__c": $.IMA_UnitMeasure, "Price__c": $.IMA_Price, "PriceMatrixFlag__c": $.IMA_PriceMatrixFlag, "PriceCodeID__c": $.IMA_PriceCodeID, "SalesTaxFlag__c": $.IMA_SalesTaxFlag, "Item_Type_Code__c": $.IMA_ItemTypeCode, "Customer_Product_ID__c": $.IMA_CustItemID, "Rev_Level__c": $.IMA_RevLevel, "OnHandQty__c": $.IMA_OnHandQty, "Family": $.IMA_ProdFam, "ModelName": $.IMA_ProdModel, "LeadTimeCode__c": $.IMA_LeadTimeCode, "PurLeadTime__c": $.IMA_PurLeadTime, "MfgLeadTime__c": $.IMA_MfgLeadTime, "ItemStatusCode__c": $.IMA_ItemStatusCode, "SalesConvFactor__c": $.IMA_SalesConvFactor, "RoutHrsExcptFlag__c": $.IMA_RoutHrsExcptFlag, "GLSalesAcctNbr__c": $.IMA_GLSalesAcctNbr, "ERP_Customer_ID__c": $.IMA_CustomerID, "OutplantLeadTime__c": $.IMA_OutplantLeadTime, "LastModifiedDate__c": $.IMA_LastModifiedDate as DateTime, "Min_Sales_Quantity__c": $.IMA_MinSalesQuantity, "SBQQ__NonDiscountable__c": $.IMA_NonDiscountable, "Non_Commissionable__c": $.IMA_NonCommisionable, "Length__c": $.IMA_Length, "Length_Unit_of_Measure__c": $.IMA_LengthUnitMeasure, "Width__c": $.IMA_Width, "Width_Unit_of_Measure__c": $.IMA_WidthUnitMeasure, "Height_Length__c": $.IMA_Height, "Height_Length_Unit_of_Measure__c": $.IMA_HeightUnitMeasure, "Weight_Unit_of_Measure__c": $.IMA_WeightUnitMeasure, "UserDef__c": $.IMA_UserDef4, //Attributes "Decor__c": $.Attribute1_Value, // "": $.Attribute2_Value, // "": $.Attribute3_Value, "D_cor_1_Direction__c": $.Attribute4_Value, "Resin_Type__c": $.Attribute5_Value, "Gauge__c": $.Attribute6_Value, "Width__c": $.Attribute7_Value, "Height_Length__c": $.Attribute8_Value, "Front_Finish__c": $.Attribute9_Value, "Back_Finish__c": $.Attribute10_Value, "Front_Add_on_1__c": $.Attribute11_Value, "Front_Add_on_2__c": $.Attribute12_Value, "Front_Add_on_3__c": $.Attribute13_Value, "Back_Add_on_1__c": $.Attribute14_Value, "Back_Add_on_2__c": $.Attribute15_Value, "Back_Add_on_3__c": $.Attribute16_Value, // "": $.Attribute17_Value, "Kuvio_Tiles_Finish__c": $.Attribute18_Value, "Solution_Number__c": $.Attribute19_Value, // "": $.Attribute20_Value, // "": $.Attribute21_Value, // "": $.Attribute22_Value, // "": $.Attribute23_Value, // "": $.Attribute24_Value, // "": $.Attribute25_Value, // "": $.Attribute26_Value, // "": $.Attribute27_Value, "Edge_Finish__c": $.Attribute28_Value, "Edge_Profile__c": $.Attribute29_Value, "Price_Basis__c": $.Attribute30_Value }

logger.doc:name: No data
logger.message: #["There is no data in the database to sync"]

logger.doc:name: Went In: route
logger.message: #["Went in Route Number: " ++ vars.route as String]

logger.doc:name: Logger: Printing error records
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "The mentioned record has errored out", "record": payload }]

logger.doc:name: Logger: Printing error records
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "The mentioned record has errored out", "record": payload }]
